name: Speculum Aeternum
description: Behold, Speculum Aeternum: The Mirrored Sanctum of Ages. Within this enigmatic collection, the echoes of antiquity are mirrored in ethereal symmetry. Each piece is a cryptic palindrome, its essence woven through the tapestry of time; an arcane riddle dancing on the precipice of perception. 101 of the rarest (antique) palindrome sats by @const_quary
